meanings.sent1: The chef's specialty was a delicious cooked dish.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating cooked meals for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cooked food at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooked food was evident in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooked meal filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The cooked vegetables were tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: I prefer my steak cooked medium-rare.
meanings.sent3: The cooked meat was a hit at the barbecue.
meanings.sent4: Her perfectly cooked pasta impressed the guests.
meanings.sent5: The cooked chicken was juicy and well-seasoned.

meanings.sent1: The cooked metal was shaped into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The cooked clay hardened into a solid structure.
meanings.sent3: The cooked glass formed intricate patterns when cooled.
meanings.sent4: The cooked sugar caramelized into a golden syrup.
meanings.sent5: The cooked wood was transformed into a sturdy table.
